newsitem.title: JAPAN: JGBs slip on firm stocks, benchmark shift.
newsitem.headline: JGBs slip on firm stocks, benchmark shift.

text.p: *Key June 10-year JGB futures end slightly lower in face of firm Tokyo stocks after staging earlier rise.
*Approaching benchmark shift from June to September also prompting sales of June as operators look to buy September.
*Domestic vehicle sales data had little to no impact.
